question: Adrenal insufficiency in not associated with -
exp: Ans. is 'd' i.e.. Metabolic alkalosis o Features of adrenal insufficiency (Addison's disease) are :-i) Hypoglycemiaii) Hyperpigmentationii) Hyperkalemiaiv) Hyponatremiav) Hypotensionvi) Metabolic acidosiso Associated features are nausea, vomiting, diarrhea and abdominal cramps.

question: Which are the hormones seen in zona glomerulosa?
exp: ANSWER: (B) MineralocorticoidsREF: Ganong 22nd ed p. 482See Physiology Post diploma June 2012 for details of Adrenal Gland
